entry.title: Yoga stretching strap blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yogi Bare®
Type: Yoga Strap
Price: 18.95

The beautifully woven yoga strap by Yogi Bare.

Made from soft cotton and measuring 1.8 meters x 40mm

The Yogi Bare Yoga strap allows you to go deeper in your asana practice to help achieve your goals

The strap enables you to ease into the more difficult postures, gradually opening your body up to achieving depth, endurance and mobility.

This is a vital tool for anyone practicing Yoga, from beginner to improver, the ways to use a Yoga strap are limitless.

The strap can be used for a range of other mobility stretches making this kit-bag must have.

entry.title: Yoga mat carrying strap forest green
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yogi Bare®
Type: Yoga Mat Carry Strap
Price: 39.95

Give your Yogi Bare mat the Bare Hug it deserves!

Our beautifully designed Yogi Bare Hug is as functional as it is stylish. Fully adjustable to snuggly fit any yoga mat at the length and height you find most comfortable. 

Crafted from Vegan Leather & durable and strong Nylon webbing.

Easy wipe clean.

Removable strap for cleaning or to simply use the base as a neat mat holder. (Marie Kondo approves) 

This is the only yoga mat carrier to take you from Y to B.

entry.title: Yoga wheel tropical cork - flexibility & support aid
entry.summary:
Vendor: Yogi Bare®
Type: Yoga Wheels
Price: 62.95

Do you know what’s wheely good? A Yogi Bare Yoga Wheel!

Why?

  • Deep front side of body stretch: Chest, shoulders, heart opening, hip flexors + abs.
  • Safe + Effective spinal massage.
  • Improves posture, spine health + mobility.
  • Restorative tool to increase flexibility.
  • Assists Yogis in exploring “advanced” postures and build confidence in backbends and inversions.
     

Yogi Bare Founder Kat’s Favourite way to use the wheel:

Lets start with a wonderful massage to warm up the spine, chest and shoulders. This is a great exercise to add into your daily practice and prepare the body.

In a seated position line the wheel up and connect against the lower back/ sacrum.

Plant the feet, take your arms overhead. Lightly push through the feet and allow your spine to melt over the wheel rolling back and forward.

Start slowly and roll to your own depth on this particular day of practice.

Once you find your sweet spot stay for a few slow measured breaths.

Gently roll back to start until your bottom connects with the floor.

Counterpose with childs pose.

How to Love me

Do not drop from a height. Store appropriately.

Spot clean + only use for intended use.

There’s lots of great ideas on Youtube + our blog!

Specifications:

Dimensions: 33cm in diameter x 13cm width
Thickness; 1.6cm
Materials Strong ABS plastic featuring 6mm thickness TPE matting exterior
